doc.title: Dog Baiting and Fighting in Valdez
doc.plot: The Malamoot and husky dogs of the North are peculiar to that region, and will not thrive in any other clime. They have a strain of the timber wolf in them, and when not at work pulling a load, are always quarrelling or fighting. We show fifty or more of them in McKinley Street, Valdez, Alaska, snarling and snapping at each other, and then in a general mix-up.
